column4: I just upgraded after 2.5 yrs from 6.06 to 8.04    Yahhhhhoooooo and had to tell someone   WOW and AMAZING
Welcome back from the stone ages. ;)
Best bet, if you want to find out about a specific type, just type "(name of webcam/model number) on ubuntu" and you'll get a lot of nice hits in Google to help you find out if it works fine or not.
